name: Float Valve operating free of obstruction
Council inspector sign off and date
Flush all water pipes before connecting fittings
Silicone Applied To Fixtures Where Required
Check All Tap Connectors For Leaks
Check Screwed Nippling In Walls For Leaks
Test TPR on HWC and safetray drains away & airgap
Check HWC For Correct Valve Installation
Check Restraints & Timber chooks are installed on HWC
Element Position on HWC Is In A Serviceable Position
Check FWG & Shower wastes are clean & clear
Check Flanges Have Been Installed Where Required
Check All Soll Pipe Connections Are Connected To Drain
Kitchen overflow working and no leaks
Picked Up All Left Over Material & Retumed to Office
All your rubbish removed or in bins provided
Check All Hot/Cold Pipes For Correct Position
Downpipe & overflow cover installed on balcony
Council inspector sign off and date
Flood Test in accordance with ASNZ 3500 (15.2)
Clip Spacing to manufacturer's specs horizontal/ vertical
release TPR and CW expansion valve
Pressure 1500 kpa or as per spec
Visual check (for leeks form valves, tees, saddles, etc)
